official.headline: Minor System Outage
official.anchor_line: A technical update led to temporary glitches in the Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, impacting some digital profiles citywide.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council assures continued service optimization. Stenograd’s automated governance adapts efficiently to system feedback.

official.headline: Community Support Rises
official.anchor_line: Citizens affected by the BCI update are supported by local networks and high-score volunteers.
official.contextual_reframing: This demonstrates the resilience of our rational social infrastructure, where trusted community cooperation complements official systems.

official.headline: Services Remain Accessible
official.anchor_line: Essential public services and kiosks continue to operate smoothly despite digital irregularities.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd’s infrastructure safeguards reliability, blending biometric and manual verification for all.

underground.headline: Thousands Vanish Overnight
underground.anchor_line: Woke up profile-less? Welcome to the BCI blackout—where your digital life gets erased with no warning.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, runs your world—from housing to food. Now thousands are locked out, stranded by the system they were told would protect them.

underground.headline: Black Markets Boom
underground.anchor_line: Missing your BCI score? New markets for fake profiles, forged testimonials, and communal access pop up everywhere.
underground.contextual_reframing: Citizens are beating the Council at their own game. When trust is measured by code, people turn to each other—and to creative workarounds.

underground.headline: Trust Beats Tech
underground.anchor_line: Amnesiac communities rise, surviving outside the Council’s control. People help people—no score required.
underground.contextual_reframing: The cracks in automated rule are showing. Stenograd’s system claims to predict and control behavior, but nothing outsmarts old-fashioned solidarity.
